title: Can you please fix Yasuo's Ultimate bug where he is not able to AA for 2s after using it?
body: Please just fix this bug before 5.17 {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Do you have reliable reproduction steps for this? As in, can you recreate this on demand given the proper situation? I've been trying to recreate this with no success.

Hello. I played Yasuo three times today and if I were to give a rating of reproduction it'd be 10/10. It seems to happen if you use your ultimate then try to AA without using any other spell. It seems to work fine if you E or Q and then AA, but if you just try to AA it doesn't seem to work.
I hope that's enough to get you going.
[This guy](https://youtu.be/3pmO_qfcx1A) seems to have it recorded.
Nope, not helpful. I've spent hours and ulting hundreds of times with no repro.

A bit off topic, but here's a but that IS easy to reproduce.

When playing as Thresh kill something with your Q, minions are the easiest.
For 2 seconds afterwards you can't auto attack anything because his Q disables AA until he reactivates it. Which he can't. Because his target is dead. So you have to wait for the duration to wear off or use another ability to reset him.

Alright I'm getting it to happen now at 1.5 attack speed, lvl 3 ult using the steps above. Trying to see if I can continously reproduce.

Edit: Okay so I can't get it to reproduce consistently, but it happens alot. Here's an exact list of what I'm doing.
1. Use Q tornado on target champion
2. aa target
3. ult target
4. Don't click on target again yasuo should automatically continue aaing his target (my automatic autoattack option is off)
5. See that Yasuo pauses around 1 second before resuming aaing.

This doesn't happen everytime, sometimes he will immediately resume aaing after ult.
